alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 7:14PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Natrona County through 800 PM MDT... At 713 PM MDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over Bar Nunn, or near Casper, moving southeast at 15 mph. This storm has a history of producing nickel size hail. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Natrona County, including the following locations... Edness K Wilkins State Park, Casper Natural Gas Processing Plant, Casper Events Center and Casper Mountain. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 178 and 188, and between mile markers 191 and 194. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
